Title: Extends the time period for the conveyance of lands for the establishment of the Gateway National Recreation Area
Summary: Extends the time period for the conveyance of lands for the establishment of the Gateway National Recreation Area until June 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 759 of the laws of 1973 relating to the transfer of lands to the United States for the establishment of the Gateway National Recreation Area, in relation to the time period in which lands may be conveyed
